fromSoilToKitchen: From our farmland straight to our kitchen

homePage.ourPurpose: In June 2021, we opened our restaurant with the aim of bringing you our own produced ingredients directly, not exclusively through fine dining restaurants. We also source our Kelemér lamb, free-range chicken and wild fruit from our estate.
homePage.menuOne: Mangalica and water buffalo taste, homemade vegetable creams
homePage.menuThree: Farm chicken soup with vegetables and noodle
homePage.menuFour: Whole roasted trout from Szilvásvárad with fresh herbs
homePage.menuFive: Fried chicken legs fried in butter or grilled chicken legs from Kelemér chicken from our farm
homePage.menuSix: Deer meat with juniper Bull’s Blood of Eger (red dry wine) sauce
homePage.menuSeven: Cottage cheese dumplings with homemade sour cream
homePage.youAreAlwysWelcome: You are always welcome in our restaurant and guesthouse!
homePage.menuByChef: The menu was prepared by our chef Attila Nagy, who previously worked in the kitchen of the Parádsasvár Castle, which he managed for 9 years.
homePage.localKitchen: The dishes are mainly based on traditional Hungarian and local cuisine, a little simple and a little sophisti-cated at the same time.

footer.openEveryDay: The guesthouse is open from Thursday to Saturday (Check out on Sunday)

roomsPage.restAfterWines: If you're looking for a rest after a delicious meal and wine, the unique air-conditioned rooms of the Pipacs Restaurant offers just that. And start the next morning with a delicious a'la carte breakfast prepared by our chef!
roomsPage.notSmoking: Accommodation in a non-smoking, air-conditioned room
roomsPage.bathroomEquipments: Bathroom equipment (soap, shower gel, shampoo, shower cap), towels
roomsPage.parking: Parking in an unguarded car park with camera surveillance
roomsPage.tax: Our rooms can be booked with breakfast, which is not included in the room rate, but can be chosen on site from our a’la carte breakfast menu.
roomsPage.breakfast: Breakfast: optional à la carte breakfast from our menu.
roomsPage.withParents: Same room with the parents with extra bed (max. 2 extra bed/room), min. 2 full-paying guests:
roomsPage.halfBoardDiscount: Discounted price for their half board meal:

eventHallPage.textOne: Our event hall has been set up on the lower level of our restaurant, which is suitable for gatherings of 20-25 people, birthdays, graduations, weddings, corporate events, and trainings.
eventHallPage.textTwo: Free Wi-Fi is available to our guests in our room equipped with unique Italian velvet chairs and a cozy bar area.
eventHallPage.textThree: To make your event with us truly unforgettable, our chef Attila Nagy will take care of the perfectly prepared meals, whether it's a buffet or served meal, adapted to individual needs.
eventHallPage.textFour: We strive for perfection so that hospitality is hospitality with us!

aboutPage.aboutTextOne: In June 2021, we opened our restaurant with the aim of bringing you our own produced ingredients directly, not exclusively through fine dining restaurants. We also source our Kelemér lamb, free-range chicken and wild fruit from the estate. The menu will be prepared by our chef Attila Nagy, who has previously worked at the Parádsasvár Castle kitchen, which he ran for 9 years.
aboutPage.aboutTextTwo: The dishes are mainly based on traditional Hungarian and local cuisine, a little simple and a little sophisti-cated at the same time. The ingredients come not only from the Kelemér estate, but also from the Mátra buffalo reserve, from where Ferenc Szalai personally delivers his buffalo products. The wild meat comes only from the wild animals of the area, where László Mag, the owner of Vadker Ltd. is personally respon-sible for the supply of the best quality royal venison steaks.
aboutPage.chefMind: Our chef's credo is to personally prepare and serve the dishes of your choice. This gives guests the oppor-tunity to ask our chef questions in person. Our guests are also welcome in our guesthouse, where, in addition to double rooms, we also offer family rooms.

menuPage.ourFoods: Our food is made from local, mainly home-grown ingredients. Our dishes are mainly based on traditional Hungarian and local cuisine.
menuPage.warningHalfPrice: Please note that the prices in the brackets are for a half portion.
menuPage.servicePrice: A service charge of +10% will be added to the prices indicated, which will be included in the total amount of your invoice.
menuPage.allergies: The allergen content of each food is marked on the menu! For further allergen information, please ask our colleagues! Thank you!
